channel.title: Comments on: Jolt Online Gaming proudly announces the release of Utopia Kingdoms, the successor to the legendary Utopia online game.

item.title: By: rawr
item.dc:creator: rawr
item.description:
They only revamps some graphics and text from www.khanwars.com , nothing else. No code changed, no gameplay tweaked, nothing.
The worst is Jolt had been lying a lot during the 'development', causing utopia userbase to go mad. Theirs anticipation is one: suppress the voices by deleting posts or topics.
item.content:encoded:
They only revamps some graphics and text from http://www.khanwars.com/ , nothing else. No code changed, no gameplay tweaked, nothing.

The worst is Jolt had been lying a lot during the ‘development’, causing utopia userbase to go mad. Theirs anticipation is one: suppress the voices by deleting posts or topics.
